Gartner CIO & IT Executive Summit 2014 | IT Strategy and Technology Trends Event
Join PGI at Gartner CIO & IT Summit 2014 in Berlin, Germany
Dear {!Lead.Salutation} {!Lead.LastName},
Thinking about attending the upcoming Gartner CIO & IT Executive Summit, 4-5 June, in Berlin?
Collaboration as an Enabler of Change
How to make sense of the multitude of options available to enterprise organisations when developing a robust solution for collaboration as part of a wider UC strategy. What implications should be considered of legacy solutions when building for the future. How to build sustainable and flexible solutions ready for deployment and fit for the future
Attend Gartner CIO & IT Executive Summit and see how to leverage new tools, technologies and trends to the fullest within the DACH region. Validate your strategy and approach, exchange best practices with peers and spark new ideas.
We look forward to seeing you in June!
Register Now With Priority Code
